definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Dahomey Amazons : this unit is available when holding territory in North Africa.
sentences.chinese: 必须拥有疆土在北非，这个单位是可利用的。

sentences.english: Dahomey Amazons: this unit is available when holding territory in North Africa.
sentences.chinese: 必须拥有疆土在北非，这个单位是可招募的。

sentences.english: Soon the northern lands will be locked in the cold of the polar night.
sentences.chinese: 很快北国疆土就会被极夜的寒冷所吞没。

sentences.english: We are two great and huge nations on opposite sides of the globe .
sentences.chinese: 我们是两个疆土辽阔的大国，分处地球的两端。

sentences.english: The two biggest in area, Sudan and Congo, are ravaged by strife and misgovernment.
sentences.chinese: 疆土最为辽阔的苏丹和刚果受到冲突和恶政的蹂躏。

sentences.english: Pushing into new territories is one way to reduce this risk.
sentences.chinese: 开发新的疆土正是减少这种风险的一种途径。

sentences.english: China is a country with an area of 9,600,000 square kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 中国是一个拥有九百六十万平方公里疆土的国家。

sentences.english: In 1868, Congress passed an act creating the Wyoming Territory.
sentences.chinese: 1868年，国会通过了创造怀俄明疆土的行动。

definition: to pioneer a frontier area/to open up new territory
Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)
to go on or send a punitive expedition
Han Dynasty term for the Roman Empire 羅馬帝國|罗马帝国[Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2]
Inner Mongolia (lit. south of the Gobi Desert)
